ValidationRule.description: When an Opportunity is associated to the resource request - The Resource Request cannot be saved when the Opp Prob % is less than 50 and the Type = 'Request Sales Hold'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL( Resource_Request_Type__c ,'Request Sales Hold'), pse__Opportunity__r.Probability < 0.50, NOT( ISBLANK(pse__Opportunity__c )))
&&$Permission.PSA_Bypass_PROD_Admin =FALSE/*Allow *F5 - PRODUCTION ADMIN profile*/
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Resource Request cannot be saved when the Opp Prob % is less than 50 and the Type = 'Request Sales Hold'
